special_text:
[+1]: Surveil 2. If you control five or more Islands, draw a card.
[-2]: [b][Create an X/X Blue Shark creature token][/b],[b] [/b]where X is the number of Islands you control.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of combat on your turn, untap all Islands you control. Until end of turn, they become 4/4 Shark creatures and gain hexproof and indestructible.”
Flash paradigm {X}{U} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
